Subject: Update EPP Server Ubuntu
Description:
Hi,

We need to upgrade our Ubuntu OS Version for our EPP Server, when speaking to a support agent the other day for another issue they advise we would need a call setting up to get this done, could we have one set up for sometime after 09/01/2025 please, many thanks
What_We_Know__c:
The Ubuntu upgrade is not possible to be performed on the VM.
A new image with a newer Ubuntu OS  has to be installed and then migrated.
Next_Steps__c: To assist the customer in migrating to the new instance
Solution_Comment__c: Mentioned that it will be performed in the near future, we can close this ticket for now, remaining for them to reopen or raise a new ticket at that time
